entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
